tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ethics_committee_members (
    member_id INT,
    member_name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE research_proposals (
    proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    submission_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ethics_committee_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE research_proposals (
    proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    submitter_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE proposal_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    comments TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE EthicsCommitteeMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(100),
    contact_details VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchProposals (
    proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_title VARCHAR(255),
    submitter_id INT,
    submission_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ProposalReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProposalProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_id INT,
    target_completion_date DATE,
    actual_completion_date DATE,
    completion_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE proposal_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_id INT NOT NULL,
    reviewer_id INT NOT NULL,
    review_comments TEXT,
    review_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE review_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id INT NOT NULL,
    reviewer_id INT NOT NULL,
    review_date DATE,
    review_outcome VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE research_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress_description TEXT,
    progress_date DATE,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
